        ECPoint infinity = eCPoint.getCurve().getInfinity();

        int i2 = 0;
        while (i < iArrGenerateCompactNaf.length) {
            int i3 = iArrGenerateCompactNaf[i];
            int i4 = i3 >> 16;
            eCPoint = eCPoint.timesPow2(i2 + (i3 & 65535));

        }
        return infinity;
    }
